Cleric level 0

  1. Bleed
    School: Necromancy
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S
    Range: Close (45 ft.)
    Target: One living creature
    Duration: Instantaneous
    Save: Will negates (DC 16)
    SR: Yes
    CL: 9
    Effect: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying.
  2. Create Water
    School: Conjuration
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S
    Range: Close (45 ft.)
    Target: Up to 18 gallons of water
    Duration: Instantaneous
    Save: None (DC )
    SR: No
    CL: 9
    Effect: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.
  3. Detect Magic
    School: Divination
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S
    Range: 60 ft.
    Target: Cone-shaped emanation
    Duration: Concentration, up to 9 minutes [D]
    Save: None (DC )
    SR: No
    CL: 9
    Effect: You detect magical auras.
  4. Detect Poison
    School: Divination
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S
    Range: Close (45 ft.)
    Target: Or Area one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
    Duration: Instantaneous
    Save: None (DC )
    SR: No
    CL: 9
    Effect: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.
  5. Guidance
    School: Divination
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S
    Range: Touch
    Target: Creature touched
    Duration: 1 minute or until discharged
    Save: Will negates (harmless) (DC 16)
    SR: Yes
    CL: 9
    Effect: This spell imbues the subject with a touch of divine guidance.
  6. Light
    School: Evocation
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, M/DF
    Range: Touch
    Target: Object touched
    Duration: 90 minutes
    Save: None (DC )
    SR: No
    CL: 9
    Effect: This spell causes a touched object to glow like a torch.
  7. Mending
    School: Transmutation
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 10 minutes
    Comp: V, S
    Range: 10 ft.
    Target: One object of up to 9 lb.
    Duration: Instantaneous
    Save: Will negates (harmless, object) (DC 16)
    SR: Yes (harmless, object)
    CL: 9
    Effect: This spell repairs damaged objects, restoring 1d4 hit points to the object.
  8. Purify Food and Drink
    School: Transmutation
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S
    Range: 10 ft.
    Target: 9 cu. ft. of contaminated food and water
    Duration: Instantaneous
    Save: Will negates (object) (DC 16)
    SR: Yes (object)
    CL: 9
    Effect: This spell makes spoiled, rotten, diseased, poisonous, or otherwise contaminated food and water pure and suitable for eating and drinking.
  9. Read Magic
    School: Divination
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S, F
    Range: Personal
    Target: You
    Duration: 90 minutes
    Save: (DC )
    SR:
    CL: 9
    Effect: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.
  10. Resistance
    School: Abjuration
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S, M/DF
    Range: Touch
    Target: Creature touched
    Duration: 1 minute
    Save: Will negates (harmless) (DC 16)
    SR: Yes (harmless)
    CL: 9
    Effect: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.
  11. Spark
    School: Evocation, FireSchool
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V or S
    Range: Close (45 ft.)
    Target: one Fine object
    Duration: Instantaneous
    Save: Fortitude negates (object) (DC 16)
    SR: Yes (object)
    CL: 9
    Effect: Ignites flammable objects.
  12. Stabilize
    School: Conjuration
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S
    Range: Close (45 ft.)
    Target: One living creature
    Duration: Instantaneous
    Save: Will negates (harmless) (DC 16)
    SR: Yes (harmless)
    CL: 9
    Effect: Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points.
  13. Virtue
    School: Transmutation
    Level: Cleric 0
    Time: 1 standard action
    Comp: V, S, DF
    Range: Touch
    Target: Creature touched
    Duration: 1 min.
    Save: None (DC )
    SR: Yes (harmless)
    CL: 9
    Effect: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.
